Get Started
Get Started

Mobile engagement for the mobile-first world.

Vibes brings the power of SMS, MMS, RCS and Mobile Wallet together in the mobile messaging platform most trusted by world-class enterprise brands.

Let's Talk
A2P SMS, MMS and RCS Connectivity

Trusted by Global Brands
and Industry Leaders

If you're looking to launch RCS the right way, you've come to the right place.

RCS Business Messaging has arrived, and Vibes is opening the doors to messaging that provides an interactive, engaging, app-quality experience (without the app!). Text RCS to 84237 to see it in action!

‍Vibes is actively launching RCS agents for brands right now, and with our direct carrier connections, we have the playbook ready for you to get started with this next chapter in digital messaging. Let's talk!

Learn More

Your mobile database is an asset. It's time to treat it like one.

Vibes is the mobile engagement platform for brands and businesses looking for true long-term customer engagement and revenue from their mobile database, not just short-term customer acquisition. Vibes is the best at both.

Poblano’s: Why not spice up your lunch
break?🌶️🌶️ Come today and get a free
appetizer! https://vbs.cm/936

Ready for more foot traffic? SMS + Mobile Wallet marketing is what works.

Start uniting digital offers and physical locations with the revenue-boosting, loyalty-driving combination of SMS and Mobile Wallet.

Vibes helps marketers create continuous customer engagement for better marketing, commerce, service and loyalty - all without the need for app downloads. It’s fully attributable, too, ensuring you’ve got top-tier measurement, targeting and ROI on every mobile campaign.

Learn More

Discover our products.

Vibes Connect SMS API

Our direct carrier connections and hands-on personal service pair the business messaging reach and reliability you expect with the trusted long-term relationship you deserve.

Lower SMS subscriber churn

The only mobile engagement platform with direct carrier connections.

Vibes is the most trusted and the last independent Tier 1 aggregator in North America. Our direct carrier connections and hands-on personal service pair the messaging reach and reliability brands expect with the trusted long-term relationship they deserve, and ensures messages take the absolute fastest, most compliant path from businesses to the customers they're communicating with.

Learn More
0% of our customers

0% of our customers have cookie-cutter mobile programs.

That's because Vibes has an unparalleled strategic focus on helping our customers achieve long-term success, and why Vibes customers see 25% lower SMS subscriber churn than those using competitive platforms.

There's no generic, ineffective batching-and-blasting with Vibes. We'll assign experts to help you build customized SMS, MMS, RCS and Mobile Wallet marketing programs that exceed your goals and rapidly boost foot traffic.

See what Vibes customers say

Vibes delivers real, measurable business Vibes delivers real, measurable business impact to world-class enterprise brands.

Major mobile-first brands like Chipotle, The Children's Place and Polo Ralph Lauren use Vibes to deliver millions in revenue, with an average 90x ROI on Vibes-powered SMS messaging programs alone.

Vibes customers see 97%+ mobile audience retention, with 3+ years average audience tenure and a less than 1% opt-out rate.

Learn More
Aces Coffee: Hi Linda! Thank you for your recent purchase. You've earned a FREE Latte on your next visit:
https://vbs.cm/sm
"The Vibes platform really allows Hibbett to have ownership. It's important for us to work with partners who have next-level technology - it creates special customer experiences that really help elevate our brand. Vibes definitely has that."
Sarah Sharp-Wangaard
VP, Marketing
Hibbett | City Gear
"Vibes' easy-to-use UX allows us to be nimble and deploy timely messages. Their team is top-notch and super knowledgeable of the SMS/MMS/RCS/ +++ industry. They come prepared with ideas to push engagements, enrollments and ROI. No pushy sales here, just great collaboration."
Courtney Tarkington
Sr. Director Customer Marketing,
JOANN Stores
,
“We saw success immediately when we started working with Vibes. They provided us with a one-stop-shop experience to ensure our text campaigns run smoothly and effectively, and they’re experts in the field of SMS. It’s non-negotiable – we are sticking with Vibes."
Jennifer Bell
Chief Marketing Officer,
Lettuce Entertain You Restaurants
"We know that mobile provides the optimal channel for brands to personalize and tailor content to ultimately drive ROI. The delivery of unique offers and loyalty cards at scale in a secure way is due in large part to Vibes. Having Vibes in place allows us to move quickly."
Jason Scoggins
Director
Loyalty & CRM, Chipotle
"Our company has been with Vibes for the better part of a decade, and they are consistently one of the best aggregators we work with. In an industry as large as the one we work in, it's easy to feel like a just another account number - but, their unparalleled customer service and account support is what really sets Vibes apart."
Jose Manchola
Commercial Project
Manager, IDT
"SMS engagement is much more immediate than email, and Vibes has helped us tap into that - now we can reach more people in real time, and more efficiently. Vibes also really cared about helping us grow our business, not just giving us a platform to use, and we were up and running much faster than we had anticipated."
Adam Price
Senior Software Engineering
Manager, Progressive Leasing
"The Vibes platform gives Festival Foods the ability to be able to take a step back and look holistically at our strategy and make adjustments accordingly - from testing various times of day for message sends, to analytics that show us how our guests are interacting with different messages, as well as measuring what that impact looks like. Vibes continues to evolve their technology to empower us to do that."
Kelly Deininger
Digital & Ecommerce
Director, Festival Foods
